{/**
  * @typedef Props
  * @property {Object} obj
  */}

# Filters

* {capitalize('capitalize')}
* {upper('uPper')}
* {lower('LOwEr')}
* {truncate('truncate', 4)}
* {abs(-3)}
* {round(3.14)}
* {replace("Hello world", "world", "Jimmy")}
* {urlencode('&')}
* {upper(truncate("nested", 4))}
* {dump(props['obj'])}
* {dump({a: 1, b: [1, 2], c: 'hello'})}
* {dump([1, 2])}
